name: Forest Escape VRmode test
description:
(This is a demo version VR)

Game description: Forest Escape is an escape game. Main goal is to collect coins (the amount depends on the level) and then find a hidden door that will take you to the next map. The game is kept in a dark atmosphere. Ultimately, the mechanics will be based on torches and lighting fires that mark the way to a hidden passage. We plan to add a few mobs and stealth elements, and a combat system in future levels.

Inputs (2 ways of moving): 

Left Joystick - moving forward/backward

Right Joystick - turn left/right 10° or turn backward

Right Trigger - teleport

Beware - menu buttons not works correctly yet (still working on it) sometimes You need to click more than once on them ;[
